name: Nextcloud Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Nextcloud Tool 节点。主要用于: Access data on Nextcloud

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Access data on Nextcloud | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Invite a user to a NextCloud organization
Get (值: get) - Retrieve information about a single user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of users
Update (值: update) - Edit attributes related to a user

path.name: path
path.description: The path of which to list the content. The path should start with "/".
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Path | 作用: The path of which to list the content. The path should start with "/".

toPath.name: toPath
toPath.description: The new path of file or folder. The path should start with "/".
toPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Path | 作用: The new path of file or folder. The path should start with "/". | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

binaryDataUpload.name: binaryDataUpload
binaryDataUpload.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

shareType.name: shareType
shareType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Share Type | 作用: The share permissions to set | 默认值: 0

circleId.name: circleId
circleId.description: The ID of the circle to share with
circleId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Circle ID | 作用: The ID of the circle to share with

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the user to invite
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the user to invite | (必填项)

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: The ID of the group to share with
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group ID | 作用: The ID of the group to share with

user.name: user
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: The user to share with

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: Username the user will have | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: displayName (值: None) - The display name of the user to invite

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
